instruction: Give an example of a text-generative model.
output: A text-generative model is a type of artificial intelligence (AI) system that is able to generate human-like text based on a given set of instructions, examples, and/or data. Examples of text-generative models include neural machine translation systems, automatic summarizers, and dialog systems. A GPT-3 (Generative Pre-trained Transformer 3) model is a popular example of a text-generative model.
